headline: Stock Market Crash: The 4 Best Dividend Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: With the market being whipsawed, now is a good time to look at some stocks with attractive dividends that could be a ballast in the rough seas.  Tariffs remain front and center, and are likely to be the main near-term and medium-term driver of stocks.  Let's look at four stocks with attractive yields to buy right now.
